name: Tower Tense
description:
This was made for the BTP Jam #3 Oh no! The forest is infested with bats! It is up to you to stop the bats from coming to the base. You must plant towers to stop the bats! If you use less towers, you get more points! The theme was less is more, In the game if you have less towers, you get more points. Its a stretch but I didnt want to abandon the game idea I already had. The music and most of the art used for the game was not made by me, it was only found in the internet.

Music: Marked by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons BY Attribution 4.0 License
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
